verses.verse: <S%G2316>God,<s%> who at <S%G4181>sundry<s%> times and in <S%G4187>divers<s%> <S%G4187>manners<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> in <S%G3819>time<s%> <S%G3819>past<s%> to the <S%G3962>fathers<s%> by the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%>

Has in <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to us by his <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he has <S%G5087>appointed<s%> <S%G2818>heir<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> things, by <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> he <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G165>worlds;<s%>

Who being the <S%G541>brightness<s%> of his <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and the <S%G5481>express<s%> <S%G5481>image<s%> of his <S%G5287>person,<s%> and <S%G5342>upholding<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things by the <S%G4487>word<s%> of his <S%G1411>power,<s%> when he had by <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G4160>purged<s%> <S%G2512><s%> our <S%G266>sins,<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G1188>right<s%> hand of the <S%G3172>Majesty<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G5308>high:<s%>

Being <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>much<s%> <S%G2909>better<s%> than the <S%G32>angels,<s%> as he has by <S%G2820>inheritance<s%> <S%G2816>obtained<s%> a more <S%G1313>excellent<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> they.

For to <S%G5101>which<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> he <S%G4218>at<s%> <S%G4218>any<s%> <S%G4218>time,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> my <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day<s%> have I <S%G1080>begotten<s%> you? And <S%G3825>again,<s%> I will be to him a <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and he shall be to me a <S%G5207>Son?<s%>

And <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he <S%G1521>brings<s%> in the <S%G4416>first-begotten<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3625>world,<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> And let <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> him.

And of the <S%G32>angels<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G4160>makes<s%> his <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> and his <S%G3011>ministers<s%> a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

But to the <S%G5207>Son<s%> he said, Your <S%G2362>throne,<s%> O <S%G2316>God,<s%> is for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever:<s%> a <S%G4464>scepter<s%> of <S%G2118>righteousness<s%> is the <S%G4464>scepter<s%> of your <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>

You have <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> and <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G458>iniquity;<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> even your <S%G2316>God,<s%> has <S%G5548>anointed<s%> you with the <S%G1637>oil<s%> of <S%G20>gladness<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> your <S%G3353>fellows.<s%>

And, You, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> in the <S%G746>beginning<s%> have laid the <S%G2311>foundation<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth;<s%> and the <S%G3772>heavens<s%> are the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G5495>hands:<s%>
They shall <S%G622>perish;<s%> but you <S%G1265>remain;<s%> and they <S%G3956>all<s%> shall <S%G3822>wax<s%> <S%G3822>old<s%> as does a <S%G2440>garment;<s%>

And as a <S%G4018>clothing<s%> shall you <S%G1667>fold<s%> them up, and they shall be <S%G236>changed:<s%> but you <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G846>same,<s%> and your <S%G2094>years<s%> shall not <S%G1587>fail.<s%>

But to <S%G5101>which<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2046>said<s%> he <S%G4218>at<s%> <S%G4218>any<s%> <S%G4218>time,<s%> <S%G2521>Sit<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> my <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, <S%G2193>until<s%> I <S%G5087>make<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> your <S%G5286>footstoo?<s%> <S%G4228><s%>

Are they not <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3010>ministering<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> to <S%G1248>minister<s%> for them who shall be <S%G2816>heirs<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation?<s%>
